languages.text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer didn't spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their turn, they gain +10 to all their characteristics next turn.
If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

languages.text: 如果装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内没有使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则下回合所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点。
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者在本回合内没有使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则下回合所有属性提高10点。

languages.text: Если персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, в следующем ходу он получает +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж в свой ход не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, в следующем ходу он получает +10 ко всем характеристикам.
Если персонаж в свой ход не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, в следующем ходу он получает +10 ко всем характеристикам.

languages.text: 使用者が自身のターンで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しなかったら、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+10上がる。
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: 自身のターンで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しない場合、次のターンで全ての能力+10

languages.text: Si el portador no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} durante el próximo turno.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su turno, gana +10 a todas sus características durante el próximo turno.

languages.text: Hat der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, erhält er im nächsten Zug +10 auf alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger während seines Zuges keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, erhält er im nächsten Zug +10 auf alle seine Eigenschaften.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur n'a pas dépensé de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, un bonus de +10 s'applique à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} au tour suivant.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur n'a pas dépensé de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant son tour, un bonus de +10 s'applique à toutes ses caractéristiques au tour suivant.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} harcamamışsa bir sonraki turda tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +10 kazanır.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.
